header.title: Interactive map of corruption processing in Bosnia and Herzegovina
header.subtitle: How to use a map?
header.description: Hovering the mouse over the regions on the map in the upper right corner will show you summary information for the prosecutor's office. Click on the desired field on the map. A new window will open an overview of the activities of the selected prosecutor's office. or you can get BiH by clicking on the menu in the lower left corner.

filter.6: Special Department - Republic Prosecutor's Office of RS

prijave.5: Orders not to initiate an investigation

istrage.5: Orders not to initiate an investigation

buttons.export: Export Report
buttons.compare: Compare Prosecution

ppk.broj_optuzenih_u_predmetu: Number of defendants in the case
ppk.sud_pred_kojim_se_vodi_postupak: Court before which the proceedings are conducted
ppk.tuzilastvo: The prosecution that represented the indictment
ppk.vrijeme_izvrsenja_djela: Time of commission of the act
ppk.datum_podnosenja_krivicne_prijave: Date of filing the criminal report / Date of formation of the file in the prosecutor's office
ppk.datum_donosenja_naredbe_o_sprovodjenju_i: Date of issuing the order to conduct the investigation
ppk.datum_potvrdjivanja_optuznice: Date of confirmation of the indictment
ppk.zaprijecena_sankcija_za_predmetno_krivic: Threatened sanction for the criminal offense in question in accordance with the criminal law
ppk.vrsta_i_visina_izrecene_sankcije_da_li_j: Type and amount of sanction imposed / whether the sanction was reduced below the legal minimum
ppk.da_li_je_presudom_izrecena_sigurnosna_mj: Whether the judgment imposed a security measure prohibiting calls, activities or functions
ppk.da_li_je_izrecena_mjera_oduzimanje_imovi: Whether the measure imposed is confiscation of proceeds of crime
ppk.da_li_je_tuzilastvo_izjavilo_zalbu_na_pr: Has the prosecution appealed the first instance verdict / is the verdict final?

compare.0: Comparison of data on corruption prosecution
